Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides a unified funding point advantage for developers creating housing units that provide certain affordable housing
Summary: Provides a unified funding point advantage for developers creating housing units that provide certain affordable housing which is intended for and dedicated to municipal workers who currently reside in shelters or homeless persons programs.
LawCode: Add ยง22-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to providing a unified funding point advantage for developers creating housing units that provide certain affordable housing
